name: Color Journey
description:
Color Journey - an incredible voyage in to the world of speed and color!

You have to jump on interactive platforms, selecting the desired color. To make instant decisions when meeting with platform-traps. Test your reactions in four worlds, with its own rules and difficulty's. How far will you go?

Test your reaction and speed of thought!

• Exciting arcade game
• Reaction puzzle
• Addictive gameplay
• Minimalistic graphics
• Relax music
• Different worlds

Play Color Journey and get a burst of energy for the whole day!
